skills.name: Crosscut Storm
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 24s] Unleashes 2 successive blade waves, dealing up to 8x25% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies in their paths. The blade waves explode when they cross, dealing 350% ATK of Physical DMG and stunning enemies for 5s, and inflicting 6 Stun Trauma.

skills.name: Sacred Rule
skills.description: After hitting a stunned enemy gain 50.0% Attack Speed and 30.0% Crit Rate for 4s. Trigger CD: 8s.
